statements: SELECT * FROM IoT_Triggered_Actions;
SELECT event_type, trigger_action FROM IoT_Triggered_Actions WHERE device_id = 123;
SELECT event_id, event_type, executed_at FROM IoT_Triggered_Actions ORDER BY executed_at DESC;
SELECT AVG(device_id) AS avg_device_id FROM IoT_Triggered_Actions;
SELECT * FROM IoT_Triggered_Actions WHERE event_type LIKE '%temperature%';
SELECT * FROM IoT_Triggered_Actions;
SELECT event_type, trigger_action FROM IoT_Triggered_Actions WHERE device_id = 123;
SELECT event_id, event_type, trigger_action FROM IoT_Triggered_Actions WHERE executed_at IS NOT NULL ORDER BY executed_at DESC;
SELECT device_id, MAX(executed_at) AS last_execution FROM IoT_Triggered_Actions GROUP BY device_id ORDER BY last_execution DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_events, event_type FROM IoT_Triggered_Actions GROUP BY event_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_events DESC;
SELECT * FROM IoTDevices;
SELECT device_name, device_status FROM IoTDevices;
SELECT device_name, device_id FROM IoTDevices WHERE device_status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM TriggerEvents;
SELECT event_type, action_type FROM TriggerEvents ORDER BY trigger_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM IoTDevices WHERE device_status='active';
SELECT device_name, device_status FROM IoTDevices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM IoTDevices WHERE device_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT device_name FROM IoTDevices WHERE device_status='inactive' ORDER BY device_id ASC;
SELECT device_id, event_type, action_type FROM TriggerEvents WHERE event_type='alert' ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM IoTDevices;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM IoTDevices ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM IoTDevices WHERE device_type='Sensor';
SELECT * FROM IoTDevices WHERE device_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM IoTDevices LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM IoTDevices;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM IoTDevices WHERE device_type = 'Sensor';
SELECT * FROM TriggerEvents WHERE event_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY event_id DESC;
SELECT t.action_name, d.device_name FROM TriggerActions t INNER JOIN IoTDevices d ON t.device_id = d.device_id ORDER BY t.action_id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_actions, AVG(action_id) AS avg_action_id FROM TriggerActions;
SELECT * FROM IoTDevices;
SELECT device_name, status FROM IoTDevices WHERE device_type='sensor';
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM IoTDevices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM TriggerEvents WHERE trigger_type='notification';
SELECT event_name, event_description FROM TriggerEvents WHERE event_name LIKE 'system%';
SELECT * FROM IoTDevices;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM IoTDevices WHERE status='active';
SELECT device_name, status FROM IoTDevices ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM TriggerEvents JOIN TriggerLogs ON TriggerEvents.trigger_id = TriggerLogs.trigger_id;
SELECT action_name, action_type FROM TriggerActions WHERE action_type='notification' ORDER BY action_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM triggers;
SELECT event_type, action_type FROM triggers WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, trigger_id, time FROM events ORDER BY time DESC;
SELECT action_name, device_id FROM actions WHERE action_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT device_name, location FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'sensor';
SELECT * FROM triggers WHERE event_type = 'notification';
SELECT event_name, time FROM events ORDER BY time DESC;
SELECT action_name, device_name FROM actions JOIN devices ON actions.device_id = devices.device_id WHERE device_type = 'sensor';
SELECT event_name, action_name FROM events JOIN actions ON events.trigger_id = actions.device_id;
SELECT device_name, location FROM devices WHERE location LIKE '%hall%' AND device_type = 'camera';
